Jetstorm: I think we should show them, when they are reformatted, what 
a techno-organic can do. What do you think? You think they'd accept to 
fight us?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> --Anachronox--
> 
> Anachronox nods, and follows Jetstorm over to the crates, and begins 
> pulling out the several parts of the shield generator. "Should have 
> this up and running on notime, eh Jetstorm. I regret not getting 
> into combat however."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Daemos smiled back. His grin, however, semmed devilish...
> > 
> > Daemos: Great! Now, while Anachronox installs the shield generator 
> and 
> > that Jetstorm plants the seeds, I would like to meet the warrior 
> who 
> > will be reformatted.
> > 
> > Jetstorm hear his commander and walks over to the crate, pulling a 
> > compartment containing blue, circuited seeds.
> > 
> > Jetstorm: (mumbling) And I wanted some freaking combat... stupid 
> > preds... you just don't know when an invasion is coming... maybe 
> > they'll want to test out their reformatted bodies, though... (he 
> > raises his head) Hey, Anachrononx, how about we teach those 
> > reformatted preds what it's like to be techno-organic?
> > 
> > He starts putting the seeds in the soil.
